nodes.text: Pontite crystals, simply known as pontite, were a type of kyber crystal found on the icy planet Ilum, used in the construction of a Jedi's lightsaber.

Pontite, along with mephite, were discovered on Ilum by Jedi survey teams thousands of years before the Galactic Empire's formation. Helical HyperCom used pontite crystals in their production of comm devices, and Galen Walton Erso, who worked at their company, suggested that they use synthesized relacite instead to halve production costs and double bandwidth.
